rules_text:
Crop-Cobbled Scarecrow enters with four +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Crop-Cobbled Scarecrow while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage, remove a +1/+1 counter from Crop-Cobbled Scarecrow, and create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Nocinomrahnap

Nocinomrahnap was used on Sid, making it redundant.
